page.title: 08THE PET SHOP, WYKE
page.content: The working day of the proprietress of the local pet shop begins at 8am. She works a six day week till eight in the evening, occasionally helped by other members of the family. Owning a shop which deals in 'live stock' means there is much work to be done, feeding, cleaning and caring for the animals as well as dealing with customers. The shop is always busy which is a testimony to its friendly service. The most popular pet purchased by customers is the mouse, but the shop also keeps more exotic animals. The owner's favourite is a parrot called Polly, whilst her husband favours the pythons and reptiles.
